bio.Bios: Hi! My name is Tiffany Than and I initiated in my fall quarter of my first year here at UCI in 2019. In my free time I enjoy exploring new eateries, making Spotify playlists, and seeing live concerts! A fun fact about myself is that I named my car Adeline. Ask me about music/tv shows, my thoughts on mukbangs, or anything at recruitment!
